newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russia T-bill trade - 2.38 trln rbls transferred.
newsitem.headline: Russia T-bill trade - 2.38 trln rbls transferred.

text.p: Government securities dealers had transferred 2.38 trillion roubles to their accounts on the government securities trading system before the market opened on Friday, the Central Bank's open-market operations department said.

Only money transferred to trading accounts before the market opens at 11 a.m. (0700 GMT) is available for investing in paper that day and is an indication of potential demand for GKO discount Treasury bills and OFZ interest-bearing government bonds.

The total limit for short positions available to dealers licensed to conduct repo operations remains 2.00 trillion roubles. The rate for repos taken out on Monday and Tuesday remains 20 percent and for repos taken out on Wednesday, Thursday and Friday remains 25 percent. Repos taken out today will expire on May 27.
